website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive model that's perfect for those wanting a simple wallet case with a variety of color options.
pros: Offered in lots of fun colors and designs
Case doubles as kickstand for simple viewing
Includes a detachable wrist strap for convenient holding
Cheaper than other models with similar features
cons: Case tends to peel after heavy use
Doesn't fit well in many back pockets

customer_reviews.title: Husband even loves how it looks
customer_reviews.text: The stitching is great quality, it's soft and feels durable. Little strap can come off if you don't want it. Looks perfect with a rose gold iPhone given it's a similar color and is matte shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Color and quality is stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product the color is perfect!!!! It’s soft and sturdy, the clip with the wrist holder is awesome! Has saved my phone so many times! The stitching is beautiful. It’s keeping it’s shape nice and I can tell I’ll be able to have it for at least a year or 2. The quality of the insert is amazing and fits my phone! Super in love with the color! If you love ocean anything, this is for you. Absolutely gorgeous color and quality!
customer_reviews.author: E. Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Materials are sturdy and I always look for pockets that are not just cut slots. This has actual pockets which is a plus. It doubles as a stand and is made well enough to keep cards in as a wallet. Fit perfectly on my iPhone 7. Just pressed it in for a snug fit. Cut outs are where they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: IL

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Feeling & Weak Magnet
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several wallet phone covers from this company. I needed a new one after the one I was using was falling apart after 6 years of use. It had lasted really well and I had only paid $7.99 for it. So I thought buying this "leather" one would last even longer. When this wallet arrived I was very disappointed. It was so stiff. It did not feel anything like leather, or even as nice as the one I had paid $7.99 for several years ago. The magnet was very weak and would not attach when I had the phone open. I returned this item .
customer_reviews.author: catmom4

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality compared to similar purchase over a year ago
customer_reviews.text: This is the second iPhone case that I have bought, and unfortunately I am very disappointed! The other exact same case which I got over one year ago lasted beautifully for about 14 months. I began using this purple case in early March and already it has shown extreme signs of cracking and peeling as I will attach the photos to show. I realize it is past the date to return . Is it too late to get a replacement or pick out another case? Thank you very much for your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Garavel

customer_reviews.title: Quality of fabric used and delivery of exactly as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I had 7+ FYY Previously so I knew what the quality was. I hadn’t really appreciated it until on the third I upgraded to a iPhone 8. I ordered a case that was maybe $5. I needed a case to take my phone home in from T-Mobile. However the quality between the two cannot even be compared. Needless to say I am sending that one back and had already packaged and ordered another FYY Phone case-this one. I had ordered the cheaper one because I wasn’t sure if I was keeping the 8. But the I am so glad I did. The quality cannot be compared. Also the packaging also is *****. J
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It has endured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover when I finally got a cellular in March of this year. It has wallet like features, but they are pretty lame. The phone case though is beautiful, has a strap so I am less likely to drop my phone. I bought another brand for a friend after I got this and hers is wearing out, particularly where the strap attaches, but mine os like new. It cleans well, and none of the design has begun to rub off after 5 months. In fairness, my phone spends most of its life on the charger though...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love this iPhone cardholder wristlet
customer_reviews.text: Love the magnetic closure, soft feel of leather, the colorful design. It holds 3 debit cards or ID. The flip stand works great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eahdeans

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and fit
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today, so can't speak to durability yet, but I'm very pleased with this phone case. It's a nice color (mine is rose gold), and my iPhone 8 fits inside perfectly, with camera and buttons, etc., aligned properly. I like the protection the case affords, with my phone completely enclosed, and the extra features of places for a credit card, ID or cash, for when I don't want to carry my purse. The magnetic close is a nice feature, and I also like the detachable wrist strap. It is a great value (mine was $8.99), especially considering the expense of replacing a phone that is damaged when dropped.
customer_reviews.author: writes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. After one month there is a plastic coating coming off and the material is distressed anywhere it bends. It’s trash now. Next time I will buy a genuine leather one, if I decide to stick with this style.
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this case. I bought my first 3.5 years ago and it still is in good shape and works but was getting dirty and worn on edges. I used it daily- mostly carrying alone in my hand but occasionally in purse. Magnet closure still strong, stitching intact, and wrist strap functional. I liked so well, I replaced with same. Convenient, compact, and secure way to carry iPhone, ID, credit card, and cash. Easy to remove and reinsert phone with soft bumpers. Case doubles as stand. With a little practice, case does not interfere with photo taking, hanging downward. Well made and useful. Only problem encountered is strong magnet erases hotel card keys.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Debby

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: She was using a plastic shell for her phone with a little ring on the back for mounting or standing. It seemed fine but collected dust/lint, etc. Then she noticed a friend with this covered 'wallet' thing and played with it as her friend provided the testimonial. Ordered one the next day. In her daily use the wallet won't fit in her evening and casual purse. Maybe clutch? I don't know. Not my department. So she swaps out cases per occasion but I do see a new purse purchase when she gets tired of that chore. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: GWH816

customer_reviews.title: I bought convenience!
customer_reviews.text: I love this iphone case. It holds my phone snugly, easy camera access. The interior pocket hold my drivers license (with the window) and the 2 cred cards I use most. I can hook my keys to the phone, carry the case around my wrist by the case wrist strap and shop, attend events, work, etc. Absolutely love it. The only item it needs would be an opening on the side of case for volume control.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bergling

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case it's beautiful! A little darker than I though but I don't care I love the way it feels. It's soft and feels right when I'm holding it. Best case I've ever bought and I have a lot of them!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: FYY Knocked it out of the Park with this one!
customer_reviews.text: Have had my phone case for over a month now and I just love it! Have received a number of compliments and questions of, "Where did you get that". Pricing was so affordable for the quality; each feature listed lives up to the claim of making it easy to carry just your necessities such as phone, ID, credit card, and some cash. Really do not need anything else but in case you want to carry a purse this fits in even the smallest clutch! Love the wristlet and the magnetic closure and use the kick stand often too! As mentioned in earlier reviews, no prob with carrying phone and credit cards at once. Great job designers at FYY!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Congdon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in glitter blue. I love the outside color. (I call it Cinderella blue). The inside is white and I’m not sure how it will wear over time. The phone holder itself is clear and I like that I can see my rose gold phone. It has only two inside pockets and the wallet type slot behind those. Another inside pocket would be nice, but not essential for my use. I’ve had other brands of the same type of case and this brand was competitively priced and appears just as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mothergooch78

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone case I could find
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case. It holds just enough for me. I get more compliments on it. This is my third one cause I actually wore them out from constant use. It takes a lot of abuse. Will definitely get another one when this one needs replacing. Can’t say enough good things about this case. I got 4 cases before this one and they were all worthless. I am very picky. So when I find one that’s perfect for me I stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: 5 star case
customer_reviews.text: This case is just what I wanted! The quality is great, looks great, made very well! So many choices to choose from. I got the black. Looks very rich, love the gold tone and the strap is a great length to carry and the lobster claw is sturdy, not cheap at all. Will buy again and again, at this price why not ?! Oh and its wrapped so nice it makes a great gift presentation.! You will love it! see through window is great to for identification.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was the second wallet case I have purchased. The first one was so great I decided to purchase the exact same thing again. Well that was a MISTAKE!! This wallet case is literally falling apart. I purchased in Jan and after only 3 months(even before the create in handle can straighten) the case is cracking at the seams and all the material inside and outside is sloughing off. I am extremely dissatisfied and disappointed with this purchase. Will have to find a new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Henninger

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the most expensive case, so I doubt it will last a really long time, but for the price, it is awesome. It came in perfect condition and fits my phone flawlessly. The slots for cards are not too tight that I can't get them out, but not too loose that I'm afraid they will fall, which is an issue I've had with similar designs. I love that it is slightly cushiony, and I think it will really protect my phone. I got the marble-looking one in purple, and have already gotten complements on it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katie McGowan

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL 👍
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT look further for an iPhone case! This case is FANTASTIC. It's cushioned on the front and back It's leather looking My phone fits in there very very snugly. No way is it going to pop out. AND MOST IMPORTANTLY The magnet is very very sturdy. (I order from a different company and the magnet was very weak. I didn't want it popping open and scratching my phone.) If you're looking for a stylish case...get this. If you're looking for durability and sturdiness...get this. Ya think I'm pleased? BEYOND!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: A quality case, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very pleased with this case. I have one of the floral designs. The colors were as I expected and the quality of the case has held up well after a couple of months use. I’ve dropped it a few times and it has protected my phone, I do have a screen protector on it as that’s not part of the case. I don’t use it to carry my credit cards so am not sure about security features I use the slots to hold notes etc and the stitching has held. The case becoming a horizontal stand has also been useful
customer_reviews.author: Marie O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Stand  ability works!
customer_reviews.text: This is So nice for that price .Had the black and gold fish scale. That design doesn’t really look like you’re carrying something that’s a fish scale. I received many complements. I got the iPhone 8. I’m surprised it is as easy to use as a stand , And the other capabilities of the case actually work well. It doesn’t fall over when you try like some of the other cheap cases That have the three settings.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Best cover ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2cd phone cover I have purchased from this company and they are great. You will not regret this purchase. I have high standards and this company provided me with the best cover. Not only does this protect my phone, it looks great. You also have places where you can carry credit card or license. Great company...try them out, you'll never go to another website again...Great job on covers, I'll always be back
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: seems well made - but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the polka dot design and was disappointed that the strap is not made from the same polka dots but is solid white, like the interior. Now that I see the photo here, it was taken with the strap on its side and the strap is the same beige-ish color not white. It's a small thing but detracts from my enjoyment of it as it looks like it wasn't intended to come together. Had I know, I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good with Blush Pink
customer_reviews.text: My phone loves it and me too :) this case fits perfectly for my iPhone 7 and has the softest texture. My intent was to use it for the little slot in the front which lets you hear and talk to anyone. A lot of people I know have this and I wanted one too. Good for cards too but it might get bulky. Anyway enjoy, I would definitely repurchase more and recommend it for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute case and great for the price. It looks and feels like a more expensive case :). Phone fits perfectly and I love having the ability to use as a phone/wallet when running errands. I also love that it is able to stand on its own (great for watching shows/videos) Shipping was really fast and it came in great condition. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone wallet combo
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Took a while to get use to it since it is totally different from what I had been using. I love it now. Could use more credit card slots but it still works. Material feels really nice and seems to be very durable. With the handle you can remove it makes it great for just grabbing it and running into the store for a quick purchase. The magnetic closure works like magic. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new case!
customer_reviews.text: It looks so much better in person. I got the gray case with the quilt like pattern. It is a very sturdy case yet not too bulky. And it has a sweet little message inscribed inside the part where the actual phone goes which I think is a nice touch to an already good case. I spent half as much as I would at a store for a case that doesn’t have all I need and want, like a wallet case for example. The company also seems to really care about their products and their customers so that’s always a plus. I’m overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina7

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the quality and price! Everything from the handle strap to the magnetic fastener is great. The card holder holds what I need and I’m able to hold my phone with ease. The slick design is really convenient. I was worried about the kickstand feature but it turns out to be a great feature that works.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant....It holds my cards and cash!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered, the package arrived empty. I believe it fell out on its way here due to part of the package was open. I called customer service and they immediately apologied and refunded me back my $. I ordered it again. I was excited to get it this time. I love watching shows on my phone and with the tilt feature, it’s perfect. I used to put my credit card inside my case hidden. With this case, it’s easier to take out AND I have room for my cash. The only downside I see is that I can’t hang it on my dashboard clip. Other than that I’d buy it again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Its all in the details
customer_reviews.text: The vibrant red color caught my eye so I had to give it a try. It is very attractive. I have had many compliments and others have picked it up to check it out. It is good quality and actually better than I thought it was going to be. The magnet holds it all together even with my cards and money and a few receipts in there. I have dropped it many times because I didn't have the strap on my wrist and my phone was safe. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck and cards won’t fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I still have it and use it up to this day. Way easier to maneuver and organize compared to having a bag on you 24/7. The cards really stay stuck into the wallet so I can go clubbing and feel confident that my cards aren’t going to fall out. I just wish there was more space for cash but it’s not too big of a deal cause I tend to use card anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Hyp

customer_reviews.title: CUTE AND PROTECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this... so much easier to hold onto my phone and FIND, especially in my purse!! :) I love the cute pattern on it and ordered one for a friend. I especially like that this seller tells how to measure to make sure this phone fits the case. Previous one I bought (from someone else) said it fit an 7/7S so I (not realizing) got it and it was too big. I do use the stylus though from the phone case I"m not using. :) Anyway, extremely nice and protective case for my phone. Kinda tight slots for drivers license, but.. I"m getting it loosened up. :)
customer_reviews.author: OhioNana

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a couple of months. I love all the features except it's hard to take pictures with your phone while holding it because you have to make sure the side isn't bent back but it's nothing that affects the product. It's holding up really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when it is closed a corner of the phone is slightly exposed which is not good for the phone
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 star to it. But, mine has a little problem. The phone holder is not properly aligned! So, when it is closed a corner of the phone is slightly exposed which is not good for the phone. Because it might develop a scratch or something more! I did not return it because, I think when something like credit card or DL or some important slips inserted in the given slots, that gives a little thickness to the pouch, which, when closed, fits the phone better. Also, I did not return it because I needed one badly. Otherwise, the product is definitely quite good. Sleek looking. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit for your credit card and only 1 credit card
customer_reviews.text: The case is really well made and very protective for my iphone 8. Quality material and very well made, the clasp is a magnet and works well. The only thing I don't care for is my drivers license barely fits in the slot that is a designated area for the license, its a tight fit for sure. Then there is one more slot for a credit card but it is also a tight fit. I wish these places for my credit card and license were a little more roomier.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.F.

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this case! Unfortunately after 2 days of use, the fabric on the corner began to look shredded. It seemed super durable, but that was ridiculously fast to start to come apart especially considering i haven’t dropped it or anything. I got the “fabric” looking one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sutton

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My new phone case is perfect. I can now shop during this challenging period in our country without having to take my entire purse with me and wonder where I can place it to keep me safe. My driver's license, credit card and insurance card have their own secure place in the case. The strap makes it easy to carry. When at home, I remove the strap to make it more convenient. Cannot speak for durability until I have have it for more time.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer's wife

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone case/wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can put debit cards, ID cards ...etc in it and don’t need my purse. The only problem is it only has 2 pockets and tough to get ID out. It needs at least 3 pockets with a little more room for cards and cash. Other then that I love it and would recommend it to anyone. I get a lot of great comments on it when I’m out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who prefers a wallet case for her iPhones. She is able to store extra money in the inner pockets or any cards. Easy for her to talk on the phone while having the case closed so she doesn't smear her screen (even though she has a screen protector). The material on the outside doesn't easily get dirty or tear like leather. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lizettegue

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS CASE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased a case like this and was a lil unsure if I’d like it or not. I fell in love the first as soon as I put it on! It’s super easy to carry and you can add your DL and credit cards. The case really protects this phone as well because it is encased all around. I can’t say enough about this case! Also love the color!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Can only hold couple of cards or some cash
customer_reviews.text: It's beautifully made. Color is not too obnoxious. Not sure how it will hold up over the months. The only reason for the 4 stars is it only holds a couple of cards and not able to put much cash in it. So you have to choose whether you want more cash or couple of cards. Basically you can't have anything too bulky in there or it won't close. My whole goal was to put my cards and cash in it so I am a little bit disappointed. I still have to carry around my other clutch wallet. I'll be looking for something else that will solve my dilemma.
customer_reviews.author: Von2222

customer_reviews.title: Rose case not durable
customer_reviews.text: While the case is beautiful it doesn’t hold up well. I purchased it on May 7th and the edges are already fraying and it’s not sturdy at all. This is not my only case so constant wear and tear is not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: W R W

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about durability, but so far, so good. The leather is bending somewhat by the wrist-strap, but doesn't look in danger of coming apart. It is a little challenging to remove the card from the clear pocket (my driver's license), but it's not impossible. Overall, it has allowed me to carry my purse fewer places as my basic necessities are all safely held together.
customer_reviews.author: April1x

customer_reviews.title: Quality first price second
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone FYY Case for iphone 7 (kickstand feature) Luxury PU Wallet Case Folio Cover with card holders. Long name.... that's ok because it provides the buyer with all the important features. My case is soft but vivid blue. The leather is smooth in my hand and slightly cushion-y. I really like the kickstand feature. It can sit on my desk, next to my desktop on the right... so the screen is easily viewable. Best of all, the magnetic-flap cover protects my iphone. I am so happy to see the variety of color options, (also masculine, feminine) so that when it's time for a little change, I can purchase a new color. Thanks FYY!
customer_reviews.author: veronica martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy case - hard to get cards out of it
customer_reviews.text: Love the rose gold color and the faux leather is great quality. I've been using this case everyday now for about 3 or 4 months and it's held up very nicely. Just some minor peeling on the edges, but that is expected. Biggest issue I have with it is that the card slots seem to be pretty tight. I often have trouble pulling my cards out as they kind of get stuck. Would like to see this be upgraded along with having maybe one or two more card slots. Overall, very happy with my purchase! Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Huschka

customer_reviews.title: My favorite iPhone case ever!
customer_reviews.text: This case is very pretty and so far seems very sturdy and durable. I love the strap which I can take on or off depending on my needs. It’s a little awkward to hold but it’s easy to get used to. Holds a DL and a couple of credit cards and maybe a folded bill, although I haven’t tried that yet. I’m very pleased with this case!
customer_reviews.author: Best GG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality Case!!
customer_reviews.text: Totally stunning well made case with couple of pockets one left side as u open for your ID or credit Card. Lovely color of pink with a slight sheen. This is the second one I’ve bought. Giving it as gift to my daughter. Fits IPhone 6 and IPhone SE(2020) no problem. Those are the only models I’ve tried the cover in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with this Cell Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone case for about a month, and I like it because I know my cell phone face will be protected from scratches and drops. The magnet is strong holding the cover in place while stored in my purse or pocket, the stitching is strong and secure, and the strap is convenient for putting on my wrist to assure the phone is not dropped. the phone fits securely in my car phone holder. I fold the cover back, and the phone is held tight by the holder. When the phone rings or a text is sent, I can look at the exposed phone face to see who sent the text or called.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE SECURITY FEATURE
customer_reviews.text: I really like that "This case is designed to protect your cards information from stealing with blocking material of RFID shielding technology" making me feel confident about putting a credit card or two in it. Although I have yet to use it for message writing, II also like its kickstand feature and the fact that you can tuck the closer flap back and have it stick while you are reading, writing or viewing. Since I purchased this case within the last month, I can't really rate it on durability, but I suspect it will last. Thanks FYY!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Product is so perfect I purchased two!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these cases for my new I Phone. It was really nicely made and I ordered it in Pink. I liked it so well that a few weeks later I ordered another case in a beautiful floral. I would definitely recommend this phone case.It comes in many styles and protects my phone perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Klose

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these cases. The first one lasted almost exactly a year. I loved it and I know I'm hard on cases, so I purchased another. It has lasted only four months. I'm going to try once more because the design is perfect for me but if it dies soon I will update this review to 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for price
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected. I’m not crazy about folding cases but this one was pretty good. My phone has dropped a couple of times because I have epilepsy and my phone was completely protected. It doesn’t hold a lot of cash but that was in the description so they were very honest about that. I would recommend this case to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 85 year old MIL
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my 85 year old mother in laws, new iPhone. She requested a pink phone case with a handle. I’m sure when she was born in 1935, she never would have thought that 85 years later she’d be carrying this gem. It helps her not drop her phone and has a handle big enough for her arthritis hands to hold. Even a place for her drivers license (lord have mercy on the days she drives). Great product for the elderly and young fashionistas.
customer_reviews.author: Power Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm happy with my purchase. My previous phone case was thinner and lighter, this one is a little heavier and thicker and looks nice. Holds less credit cards than I expected, so it's just safely enough for 3 at most without over stretching it. Wish the attached wrist band was a little thicker though, will update at a later date if it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Just Karla

customer_reviews.title: I love the feel of the wallet/phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the wallet/phone case. I was worried about how my phone would stay in but when the package arrived, it come will a clear phone case that's put in place that I absolutely love!! I also love how I can answer the call and the close the phone case again so my wallet sort is not showing!! I would recommend a sturdier clip and wristlet strap. I feel like they are not too durable and I'm a little concerned about how long that part will last. Other than that, I love the product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Attractive, Practical Case
customer_reviews.text: This wallet-style case is protective of the entire phone, including the screen. It has a magnetic closure and a wrist strap. It can also be used as a phone stand in the landscape orientation. I've had two other cases like this one, and they were excellent and practical. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This iPhone holder/credit card holder is wonderful. It appears durable and holds the iPhone in place securely. The see through driver’s license slot is good with an opening in the plastic cover, which enables you to slide out the driver’s license easily. I only wish it had more credit card slots.
customer_reviews.author: LADesigner

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am not big on writing reviews but I am so happy with this case that I wanted to share it. I was very skeptical, to be honest, now am thinking about getting another. It is inexpensive enough to not cry over it when it breaks, (and I think it will last awhile), but it a quality of a pricey one.
customer_reviews.author: Lala VS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Case For My iPhone 7 but...
customer_reviews.text: the slots for the cards are rather small and you can only fit 1 card. If you add more. The ear piece doesn't reach the hole so you can't make calls when it is closed. However I love the feel of the case and it is honestly pretty cute. Very elegant design and goes well with any outfit. I can even put charms on it and make it my own. True rating would possibly be 4.5 stars if I could do half stars.
customer_reviews.author: Skyrah Bai

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! It's very durable and holds a lot of cards/id's in it. The leather casing helps the case to close with a strap that is very durable/stretchy. The flexible plastic that keeps the phone in place is fantastic. Easy to place and remove your phone into this case. Only downside is it only has two slots for credit cards/ID's. Thus, it makes the case pretty bulky and puts a lot of tension on the magnetic strap/close. However, the magnet is strong because it hasn't failed me yet. I really like this case. I'd buy it again, but with three card slots instead of two to reduce the bulkiness and tension.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed . . .only one very minor thing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet case flip folio Cover. I love the color and I love that there's a strap that comes with it. The only issue I'm having is with attaching the strap. The clasp is very hard to open and doesn't pull back far enough to attach easily. I eventually got it on but not before causing a chip in my fingernail :-( Otherwise, it's a great case!
customer_reviews.author: tross61

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a few minutes ago so I can’t attest to qualities like durability but it looks to be of very good quality out the box. My only complaint are the pockets for the cards. I would have liked the first pocket with the translucent window in it to have been clear and large enough to fully display my drivers license.
customer_reviews.author: RTee

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular with my iPhone wallets. This has a gorgeous design, the material has quality construction, inspiring words inside case and perfect size for my credit cards, ID and a what I need. Hands down this is a great product from a timely seller of reputation!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri C. Engler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the color (blue) and while I thought I would never use the little handle, I use it all the time!!!. another added safety features, from dropping in the toilet, to leaving it at the store, etc, very good size, I bought an extra one for when this one wears out...
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: New case for an upgraded iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to a newer iPhone and required a new case to protect it. I have used this style case for my other phone, love the practicality convenience and protection that it offers the phone and the screen. Delivery was absolutely and time even at peak holiday shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Love threads

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it, there are better cases out there
customer_reviews.text: not very good. the pockets are a bit too tight, so pulling cards out is a challenge. also, it is rather large and clunky, with lots of extra space when you close the cover. this makes it uncomfortable to use your phone vertically if you move the cover to the backside of the phone. material also feels a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia W

customer_reviews.title: Overall - Great product
customer_reviews.text: The wallet can carry about about 6/7 cards The material is nice For the price that you get it’s worth it and well I recently bought it I’m hoping to come months later and update the review and see how long it’s last me because I’ve bought other wallet cases and they seem to wear off very quick let’s just see how this one lasts
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Rebollar

customer_reviews.title: Convenient phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love that this good looking, little case holds a credit card, cash, my license and phone and I don't have to carry a purse. I just got it, so I can't comment on it's durability, but it looks like it will hold up. I wouldn't have any hesitation recommending this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ellenb

customer_reviews.title: Very good case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The rose gold color matches the color of my wife's iPhone 8 Plus and she loves the slip pockets for driver's license, credit cards, money and such. It arrived exactly as advertised and when expected. More than likely to order another when the times comes.
customer_reviews.author: Krkrjk

customer_reviews.title: Secure!
customer_reviews.text: Life changer! I’ve never been big on carrying a purse so being able to put my card in something I always have on me is amazing. My cards always feel secure and I never feel like I’m going to lose them. It’s also padded enough that I feel my phone is secure if it somehow drops to the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the $- Update: you get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered different models and they do not disappoint at all! They last a long time! Update: This last model I ordered in black and the strap did not last 60 days... very disappointed with this. The other models lasted a lot longer thankfully I can fall back on one of those. Clara
customer_reviews.author: CLARA A. PULIDOCASTILLO

customer_reviews.title: Have had 6 months and absolutely love it. Will be ordering another in purple
customer_reviews.text: Was going to order an Otter Case until I noticed this. Have had 6 months and absolutely love it. Will be ordering another in purple. Protects my phone and easy to take anywhere. Nice quality,
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second iPhone case from this company. The first one was for my 6 and I just got another one for my 7. Good quality. Phone fits perfectly. The magnet is nice and strong. I like that the holder the phone goes into is rubber and not plastic. Overall, a great case.
customer_reviews.author: LanolinGirl

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need in one small place.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and size of this wallet. I feel good knowing my phone has extra protection. It holds a few bills, a credit card or two and my driver's license and proof of insurance. That covers my needs exactly. It's very attractive which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Graycee

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case that I have bought from this dealer. I love being able to take all my cards and ids with me without having ya carry a bulky purse. This is perfect for concerts and sporting events. The only reason i did not give this case a five star rating is that I think the material used could be a little better and durable. The card pockets have a tendency to stretch over time which is why I purchased a new one after two years. Otherwise this is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: aaron carroll

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Quality & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it two times for my mom. The first one started to peel around the magnet strap area as wear-and-tear so I got a second one to replace it after nearly a year. Now after a few months, it’s still holding up as if new. On top of being a lovely dark shade of red, it’s a great accessory piece with my mom’s style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gold case is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I got the gold case and it really is beautiful. It’s the best cell phone case I’ve had. I don't plan on using the credit card compartments will put in an identification card in case of loss. I find the handle very convenient and the size perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Shulman

customer_reviews.title: This product is gross!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give even one star in any category for this product. When i took it out of the package it had the most disgusting odor i could not even use it. In fact the odor transferred to my hand and i had to wash my hands after holding it. I tried to clean the case but it still stank like a dead animal. I believe it may have been caused by some dying or tanning process that was used. It was gross! And it went into my garbage can! I can't believe you are selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with the case and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The phone case arrived today and I'm impressed by many things: It looks good, I like that it’s RFID and I like the way the “upgraded hand rope” is designed. The color I chose LOOKS like the color I chose. The case feels good in my hand and the flip stand feature works well. My phone fit easily into the case and the magnetic clasp is STRONG. I gave it a 5 for durability, but I’ve only had the phone case less than a day. Still, based on the other features of the case, I expect it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleMom49

customer_reviews.title: My best Xmas gift to myself
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Otter case with this one. I prefer the open and close case. I can put my business cards inside and it's easier to carry. I ordered the shiny pink case so that I can easily find it. It's so pretty that it makes ME feel pretty. I ordered and received it within 3 days. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga by Dayna

customer_reviews.title: perfect case at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 9 year old daughter because all of her other cases have been ruined or tampered in some way. I like this case because it encloses the phone and the closure is magnetic so its sure to close, no button or latch needed. I also loved the packaging it came in. The detachable strap is perfect for someone who misplaces their phone easily as it fits on the wrist. I also like the slots where you can put money, cards, pictures, etc. I placed cash inside for her and she can carry it to school for lunch that way. Overall, great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: FYY Case for iPhone 7/iPhone 8,
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! quality is good and well made, price is even better bought this for my new iPhone 7. Very convenient has 2 slots for driver license and a credit card and inside slot for money bills. Also comes with an attached case to insert your phone. Delivered super fast. Will recommend this item to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This case is attractive, fits the iPhone SE perfectly, allows room for a few credit cards / license to eliminate the need for a handbag. Fits in my pocket, which makes me happy. The removable strap is handy when no pocket is available.
customer_reviews.author: MBrookes

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone 7 Case — Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Wore out my last iPhone case. This omen has all the features I was seeking plus it has RFID protection. I gave “Easy to Hold” only 4 stars because this case is a bit heavier than my original one. I think I’ll get used to it. Also, the heavier materials may make it more durable in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft to the touch!
customer_reviews.text: I like the polka dot design with the off-white background. The feel of the folio is soft and smooth. Much better than I expected. I’m using for a work phone that I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on but yet wanted to be stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit IPhone 7/8 as per description
customer_reviews.text: The case looks very nice and I was exited to put my IPhone 7 in it. Unfortunately it is missing a whole inch in the length . This is not for an IPhone 7/8.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this case
customer_reviews.text: It has great padding to make it feel like my phone is secure and the magnet is so strong on these to keep it closed. It's tight at first so you would only be able to fit a few cards but after some use, you can add more to it. Because of this case, I made sure to get the bigger one from this seller for my XR phone as I trusted that the magnet and phone would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Willow

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have paid more for much less quality. This is very nice. I can't speak to the durability as I have only had it a few days, but it feels sturdy and is not made of flimsy cardboard-like material like some other inexpensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: JWH Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case for my SE 2020 phone because I had gotten one for my XR phone and loved it. But this one was cheap and I had not had it for more than two weeks and the leather on the clasp was cracking. I was so disappointed. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tough case
customer_reviews.text: The case has a hard shell that the phone fits into, the card holder is big enough for the cards to fit. The outer faux leather is soft and durable, magnet holds the case closed tightly. Very nice product, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case. It is hard to hold compared to a normal case but it holds up better than a normal case. I love having the wallet, it holds all of my cards easily. The handle it comes with is super convenient too!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Consider purchasing this case to protect your phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the rose gold color and style. It fits the Apple SE2020 perfectly. I can’t tell you yet if it’s durable, since I’ve had it less than 2 weeks, but it seems like it will hold up well, and the price is right The photo on Amazon matches what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene K.

customer_reviews.title: FYY Case for iPhone 8/iPhone 7/iPhone SE (2nd) 2020
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case of the same brand that I have purchased. It is very nice to look at and I ordered the color rose gold. This is my favorite color. It is a good quality case and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Barrick

customer_reviews.title: NICE DURABLE CASE- Holing up well over a yr.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’ve had it for a year of continued use & continues to function well. Starting to wear at edges cosmetically. I’ll probably use it until I get a new phone in 6 mos. I like that I can fit about 5 other cards in it or a few bills (money) folded up. CONS- wish it had a smidgent more space in the ID holder. It’s a tight fit for getting drivers license in & out but would not stop me from buying again. My iPhone has stayed safe & protected through MANY falls & Grandchildren use for games.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The wrist strap came bent in half and I can’t get the crease out. Also came smelling like cheap plastic but that’s finally dissipated. Fits my phone fine, but not a Standard size ID. Also, the ID slot is so cloudy you can’t see the words or photo on the card and you have to take it out. You have to take that card out no matter what (which is not simple) so it may as be not be clear at all. There is only 1 “ID” slot and two card slots. But no where to put cash, so that is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet/iPhone case to protect my phone from getting lost in my bag and it proved to be immediately helpful for that purpose. It’s such great value for what it offers: compact enough to fit in a jacket pocket, easy to carry as a wristlet for those quick trips to the market, and makes a handy stand for movie watching. I should’ve purchased this much earlier as it would have saved the screen from excessive wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Nirvanamom

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The case is attractive,looks more expensive, and phone is secure. However, I have only had it for a little over a month and the edges are peeling off around the magnet closer and the inside where the credit cards slide in has rubbed off. Disappointing because it's so convenient and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. The only problem is that I like to carry a certain amount of money on me and I can’t :/ I’ll juST have to also carry my other wallet on me. :) this kinda forces me to have only what I need which I need to learn lol
customer_reviews.author: Joom

product_meta.title: FYY Case for iPhone 8/iPhone 7/iPhone SE (2nd) 2020 4.7"[Kickstand Feature] Luxury PU Leather Wallet Case Flip Folio Cover with [Card Slots][Wrist Strap] for iPhone 8/7/SE (2nd) 2020 4.7" Rose Gold
feature_bullets: Unique RFID Blocking Technique: Radio Frequency Identification technology, through radio signals to identify specific targets and to read and copy electronic data. Most Credit Cards, Debit Cards, ID Cards are set-in the RFID chip, the RFID reader can easily read the cards information within 10 feet(about 3m) without touching them. This case is designed to protect your cards information from stealing with blocking material of RFID shielding technology.
Specifically for iPhone 8 2017/iPhone 7 2016/iPhone SE(2nd) 2020 4.7". Top quality. Made with Premium PU Leather. 100% Handmade.
Large Capacity. Card slots and Note Holder provide you to put debit card, credit card, ID card, receipts or some change while on the go.
Multiple Functions. Kickstand function is convenient for movie-watching or video-chatting. Easy access to all ports and controls.
One-year quality support. If you have any quality issue with our case, please feel free to contact our customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,913 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
